titleStmt.title: A congratulation in honour of the annual festival of the lords, knights, esq. and yeomandry of the county of Hertford, at Merchant Taylors Hall, on Thursday Sept. 6, 1655 ...
titleStmt.author: Crouch, John, fl. 1660-1681.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
